arts.ttl: Chelsea Urge Psg’s €65M-Rated Target to Join Manchester United
arts.sum: Manchester United and Paris Saint-Germain are clubs linked to Chelsea standout Christopher Nkunku. Moreover, new information suggests that the Frenchman’s time with the Blues may soon be over. Recently, Sky Sports Germany’s Florian Plettenberg indicated that Nkunku has no plans to leave in the winter transfer window. arts.ttl: Man Utd Set to Join PSG in Pursuit of €60M-Rated Man City Target

Now, another Premier League club is also getting involved. arts.ttl: Man Utd on Alert as Newcastle, West Ham Lead Chase for PSG Outcast
arts.sum: With the January transfer window opening in a couple of weeks, the rumors regarding Randal Kolo Muani will only keep growing, especially if the lack of playing time continues. arts.ttl: European football: Kane hits hat-trick for leaders Bayern as PSG cruise
arts.sum: England captain breaks Bundesliga record with 50th goal PSG win 3-0 ahead of Champions League trip to Munich The England captain Harry Kane scored a hat-trick, with two of the goals in second-half stoppage time, to give Bayern Munich a 3-0 victory over Augsburg on Friday. The win helped the hosts open up an eight-point gap at the top of the Bundesliga. Bayern, who take on Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League next week, are undefeated in the league and have 29 points after their fifth consecutive league game without conceding. Second-placed RB Leipzig, who travel to Hoffenheim on Saturday, are on 21 points. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | PSG 3-0 Toulouse: League leaders coast to win ahead of trip to Munich
arts.sum: In truth, the Ligue 1 leaders were approaching their return from the final international break of the year with an eye and a half on their midweek trip to Munich.…

arts.ttl: PSG to Re-Release Iconic 2001-02 Ronaldinho Kit
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain is set to reissue one of their most iconic kits—the 2001-02 home jersey famously worn by Ronaldinho during his debut season in Europe.
